Articles.Content:
I decided to play Kerbal space program after a Year or two and i have an issue with the Text being displayed as "AutoLOC" when i try to use the Action groups on the Control surfaces of a Plane which will show me a text of "#Autoloc_6006035" instead of Activate/deactivate and so on i can't seem to fix it with veryfying my Steam files nor does completly reinstalling/redownloading the Game from Steam

I'm running the latest version of the Game (1.11) without DLC's or Mods its just the stock game and the Problem is in both the Career and Sandbox mode of the Game.

I have no idea how i can fix this here is a Image that shows my problem.
Looking through my "Dictionary.cfg" and searching for those numbers will come up with nothing like they are not listed in the dictionary.cfg in the Localization folder.

 

Edited January 16, 2021 by Gundalf
wrong cfg name

Squad made a mistake and put those translations into the Breaking Ground DLC, instead of the main-game translations file.  I happen to have that DLC installed and I see this list:

Spoiler

Activate Pitch Controls
Deactivate Pitch Control
Toggle Pitch Control
Activate Yaw Control
Deactivate Yaw Control 
Toggle Yaw Control
Activate Roll Control
Deactivate Roll Control
Toggle Roll Control
Activate All Controls
Deactivate All Control

I added this problem to their bug tracker (link).   We can add other missing translations to that report if we find them.

1 hour ago, Gundalf said:

I have no idea how i can fix this

If you know how to be careful with computer-read text files, you could add the correction I put on that bug report to your dictionary.cfg.   It is not obvious to me whether you will want to do that, though.  It might be more messing about than it is worth to you, or Steam might correct the changes and undo your work.

Edited January 17, 2021 by OHara

6 minutes ago, OHara said:

Squad made a mistake and put those translations into the Breaking Ground DLC, instead of the main-game translations file.  I happen to have that DLC installed and I see this list:

  Reveal hidden contents

Activate Pitch Controls
Deactivate Pitch Control
Toggle Pitch Control
Activate Yaw Control
Deactivate Yaw Control 
Toggle Yaw Control
Activate Roll Control
Deactivate Roll Control
Toggle Roll Control
Activate All Controls
Deactivate All Control

I added this problem to their bug tracker (link).   We can add other missing translations to that report if we find them.

If you know how to be careful with computer-read text files, you could add the correction I put on that bug report to your dictionary.cfg.   It is not obvious whether that will want to do that, though.  It might be more messing about than it is worth to you, or Steam might correct the changes and undo your work.

I fixed it 5 Minutes ago by comparing the order in a Screenshot with the Loc names of mine and it works for anyone having the Issues here is the list i did.

                #autoLOC_6006035 = Activate Pitch Controls
                #autoLOC_6006036 = Deactivate Pitch Control
                #autoLOC_6006037 = Toggle Pitch Control
                #autoLOC_6006038 = Activate Yaw Control
                #autoLOC_6006039 = Deactivate Yaw Control
                #autoLOC_6006040 = Toggle Yaw Control
                #autoLOC_6006041 = Activate Roll Control
                #autoLOC_6006042 = Deactivate Roll Control
                #autoLOC_6006043 = Toggle Roll Control
                #autoLOC_6006044 = Activate All Controls
                #autoLOC_6006045 = Deactivate All Controls

Thank you.

Edited January 17, 2021 by Gundalf
